TopicTitle: Access Violation error when going EVA on Minmus

Articles.Content:
This has happened twice in similar circumstances; I was landed on Minmus, then clicked the EVA button, pressed space to let go, and pressed R to activate the jetpack all in quick succession.

The game then crashed with [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/18741755/logs.zip](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/18741755/logs.zip) these error logs.

Mods installed: 

CrowdSourcedScience

DistantObjectEnhancement

KerbalEngineer

KerbalJointReinforcement

KSP-AVC

Hotrockets

SmokeScreen (for hotrockets)

SurfaceLights

Kerbal Alarm Clock

No idea if it is actually any of these mods or just a stock issue, but any help would be appreciated.
